Verses: 1 karththaave, Dhaaveedhaiyum Avanudaiya Sagala Ubaththiravaththaiyum Ninaiththarulum.
2 avan: Naan Karththarukku Oru Idaththaiyum, Yaakkobin Vallavarukku Oru Vaasasthalaththaiyum Kaanumattum,
3 en Veedaagiya Koodaaraththil Piravesippadhumillai, En Padukkaiyaagiya Kattilinmel Eruvadhumillai;
4 en Kangalukku Niththiraiyaiyum, En Imaigalukku Urakkaththaiyum Varaviduvadhumillai Endru,
5 karththarukku Aanaiyittu, Yaakkobin Vallavarukkup Poruththanai Panninaan.
6 idho, Naam Eppiraaththaavile Adhin Seydhiyaik Kettu, Vanaththin Veligalil Adhaik Kandom.
7 avarudaiya Vaasasthalangalukkul Piravesiththu, Avar Paadhapadiyil Panivom.
8 karththaave, Umadhu Vallamai Vilangum Pettiyudan Neer Umadhu Thaabara Sthalaththirkul Ezhundharulum.
9 ummudaiya Aasaariyargal Needhiyaith Thariththu, Ummudaiya Parisuththavaangal Gembeerippaargalaaga.
10 neer Apishegampannuviththavanin Mugaththai Umadhu Dhaasanaagiya Thaaveedhinimiththam Purakkaniyaadhirum.
11 un Karppaththin Kaniyai Un Singaasanaththinmel Vaippen Endrum,

12 un Kumaarar En Udanpadikkaiyaiyum, Naan Podhikkum En Saatchigalaiyum Kaaththu Natandhaal, Avargal Kumaararum Endrendraikkum Un Singaasanaththil Veetriruppaargal Endrum, Karththar Thaaveedhukku Unmaiyaai Aanaiyittaar; Avar Thavaramaattaar.
13  Karththar Seeyonaith Therindhukondu, Adhu Thamakku Vaasasthalamaakumpadi Virumbinaar.
14  Idhu Endrendraikkum Naan Thangum Idam; Idhai Naan Virumbinapadiyaal, Inge Vaasampannuven.
15 adhin Aagaaraththai Naan Aaseervadhiththu Varuven; Adhin Ezhaigalai Naan Appaththinaal Thirupdhiyaakkuven.
16 adhin Aasaariyargalukku Ratchippai Uduththuven; Adhilulla Parisuththavaangal Migavum Gembeerippaargal.
17 ange Thaaveedhukkaaga Oru Kombai Mulaikkappannuven; Naan Abishekampannuviththavanukkaaga Oru Vilakkai Aayaththampanninen.
18 avan Saththurukkalukku Vetkaththai Uduththuven; Avanmeedhilo Avan Gireetam Pookkum Endraar.
